text: Bɨlel Yislel binɨb kɨli takaw Mosis ñu kɨl tɨkak ak dɨlak. Takaw anɨb ak anɨb agak, Bɨ Lipay jɨj ak kɨli bɨ God nop sɨbogep wog ak gɨnɨgel agak. Kɨli pen wog ak gel, binɨb okok God binɨb ne suŋtep yɨbɨl mɨdebɨlap, bɨ kɨdeyɨl Melkisedek tek ke olap agyokek owak ak ma agyokɨpɨkop. Bɨ Lipay jɨj ak, bɨ Elon based kɨli bɨlel yolɨgup ak, kɨli bɨ God nop sɨbogep mɨdɨlɨg nep mɨdebɨlap. Pen tep ma gek, God bɨ kɨdeyɨl Melkisedek God nop sɨbogep tek olap agyokak.
